author: Special Correspondent
text:
The month-long free coaching programme for the benefit of the candidates appearing for the Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission Group II and VAO examination concluded at the Bharathiyar Arts and Science College, Attur, recently.

The programme was organised jointly by the District Employment Exchange and the Bharathiyar Arts and Science College. Experts from different fields conducted classes in subjects General Tamil, Quantitative Aptitude, Science, Social Science, Indian Economy and Indian Constitution. A model test was conducted on the final day.

S. Elayappan, chairman, Bharathiyar Arts and Science College, A. K. Ramasamy, secretary, and D. Rajakumari, principal, spoke.
title: Free coaching programme ends
